00031   void realloc(int newSize) {
00032 
00033     // make a new array and put it into place
00034     T *oldArray = fArray;
00035     T *newArray = new T[newSize];

00037     int oldSize = fAllocation;
00038     fAllocation = newSize;
00039 
00040     // copy the contents and delete the old array
00041     if(oldArray != NULL) {
00042       memcpy(newArray, oldArray, oldSize*sizeof(T)); 
00043       delete[] oldArray;  
00044     }
00045 
00046   }

00050   int fAllocation;
